import React, { useEffect , useState}from 'react' import './game-comment.css' function getComment() { // var cmt = document.getElementById("game-comment__account-btn").value } const games = [ { id: 1, name: '2048' }, { id: 2, name: 'flappy' }, { id: 3, name: 'sudoku' } ] function GameComment({user}) { useEffect(() =>{ if(user){ document.getElementById('test1').style.display = 'none' document.getElementById('test2').style.display = 'flex' console.log(user.games) } },[user]) return (
